body.p: This roadmap outlines planned improvements for the DITA-OT Gradle Plugin.

ul.li: Built-in DITA-OT Download: Automatic download and caching of DITA-OT distributions
Plugin Installation Task: First-class support for installing DITA-OT plugins
Improved Error Messages: Clear, actionable error messages with suggestions
DITA Validation Task: Validate DITA content before transformation
Incremental Build Support: Smart change detection for faster builds
Link Checker: Verify internal and external links
Gradle Wrapper Integration: Include wrapper setup in examples
Watch Mode: Automatic rebuild on file changes
Multi-Format Task: Generate multiple outputs from single task
Kotlin DSL Examples: More Kotlin DSL documentation
Build Progress: Visual progress indicators
DITA-OT Version Management: Switch between versions easily
Preview Server: Live preview with auto-refresh
Build Metrics: Performance tracking and reporting
Docker Support: Containerized DITA-OT execution
IDE Plugins: IntelliJ and VS Code integration
Build Cache: Distributed caching for CI/CD
